


```{r}
library(e1071)
```

```{r}
#reproducible
set.seed(1)

#matrix of 20 by 2 of random numbers
x=matrix(rnorm (20*2), ncol=2)

#taking 10 values each of -1 and +1
y=c(rep(-1,10), rep(1,10))


x[y==1,]=x[y==1,] + 1
```

```{r}
plot(x, col=(3-y))
```
```{r}
dat=data.frame(x=x, y=as.factor(y))
```

```{r}
svmfit=svm(y∼., 
           data=dat , 
           kernel ="linear", 
           cost=10,
           scale=FALSE)
```

```{r}
plot(svmfit,dat)
```

```{r}
svmfit$index
```

```{r}
summary(svmfit)
```
```{r}
set.seed(1)
tune.out=tune(svm, y∼.,data=dat,
              kernel ="linear",
              ranges=list(cost=c(0.001, 0.01, 0.1, 1,5,10,100) ))
```


```{r}
summary(tune.out)
```

```{r}
bestmod=tune.out$best.model

summary(bestmod)
```
